thread.title: Balakrishna calls for more films on Telugu history
thread.title_full: Balakrishna calls for more films on Telugu history - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Balakrishna calls for more films on Telugu history
text: Nandamuri Balakrishna called for the making of more films that glorify Telugu history and culture. Speaking at the audio launch function of Sathi Thimmamamba, Balayya said that the influence of other languages and cultures on Telugu society is adversely affecting the very existence of Telugu language and history. Balayya said that more Telugu films should be made to counter this cultural invasion. Revealing that Sathi Thimmamamba was a family member of the great emperor Sri Krishnadevaraya, Balayya congratulated the film's unit for bringing out a film that reflects Telugu heritage and culture.
